content.description:
Under the Gun starts just right of

Death Wish

(5.12d). Steep. A difficult set up off a poor undercling and a horrible sloper pinch, then toss a mile for a good hueco. Everything cuts loose and if you can hang on, steep sidepulls and tricky techno moves await you.

This route starts at the same location as

Lethal Weapon

(5.12c/d), head left and up. Climb just left of the arete past a sloping ledge system to the top. It is harder than it looks and quite pumpy.

Steep and overhanging, Lethal Weapon ascends the face and arete on the left of Lethal rock. Charge up the face to an undercling, followed by moving left to a kneebar and a series of long reaches, crimps, underclings, side pulls and heel hooks. Local Classic
content.protection: One hanger 4 chain draws to anchors
content.location: 2nd route from the left starts in the flat area below the patio

content.description:
Death Wish starts just right of

Lethal Weapon

(5.12c/d). Long powerful tosses, underclings, double kneebars and more long tosses to a tricky in your face move.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a drop in anchor

content.description: Chick Route is located down and around the corner to the right of the steep south face, on the east, low angle face. Start below the first tier, climb the low angle face to the ledge, continue up the second tier(crux, right off the ledge)to the anchors.
content.location:
The best way to approch this route is to walk up the left side of The

Crossfire Crag

to the route called

Jug Haul

, cut across(south) the small drainage to the base of this route. Chick Route is 30 feet from

Jug Haul

.
